subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Mets fans will pay a price for last season’s success. The team raised ticket prices for every seating level, the steepest increase being $12 for box seats. Those tickets now range from $72 to $108, compared with the $60 to $96 range last season.
snippet: Mets fans will pay a price for last season’s success. The team raised ticket prices for every seating level, the steepest increase being $12 for box seats. Those tickets now range from $72 to $108, compared with the $60 to $96 range last season.
